SEARCH
Module io.inverno.tool.buildtools
Package io.inverno.tool.buildtools

Class ModuleInfo

java.lang.Object
io.inverno.tool.buildtools.ModuleInfo
public class ModuleInfo extends Object

Describes a module-info descriptor as specified in the Java language specification.

Multiple ModuleInfo instances can be specified on the ModularizeDependenciesTask to override or extend module-info.java descriptors generated when modularizing project's dependencies.

Since:
1.4
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn

  • Constructor Details

    • ModuleInfo

      public ModuleInfo()

      Creates a blank module info.

    • ModuleInfo

      public ModuleInfo(String name, boolean open, List<ModuleInfo.ImportDeclaration> imports, List<ModuleInfo.RequiresDirective> requires, List<ModuleInfo.ExportsDirective> exports, List<ModuleInfo.OpensDirective> opens, List<ModuleInfo.UsesDirective> uses, List<ModuleInfo.ProvidesDirective> provides)

      Creates a module info.

      Parameters:
      name - the module's name
      open - true to open the module, false otherwise
      imports - the list of import declarations
      requires - the list of requires directives
      exports - the list of exports directives
      opens - the list of opens directives
      uses - the list of uses directives
      provides - the list of provides directives
